channel.title: Specialist Correspondent on AAN World News
channel.description: Recent content in Specialist Correspondent on AAN World News

item.title: Tanoa Burns
item.description: Sunday, 28 February 2038. With the Horizon Islands still reeling from the destruction of the Horizon Islands Defence Force late last year. The islands’ of Tanoa has exploded in to turmoil as CSAT and NATO forces fight for control over the islands’. The fighting reached a new high as Napalm was used near a Banana plantation in the centre of Tanoa, today. The number of casualties has yet to be determined.
